title: Requesting an oral hearing for a District Court appeal to a BK Ct. ruling that is normally decided on the papers
question: Is there anything I can file in U.S. District Court for an appeal on a Bankruptcy Court ruling after all the briefs have been submitted requesting an oral hearing? Would this be an ex parte application for an oral hearing?
answers: Maybe, but the first thing you have to do is hire a bankruptcy lawyer who is experienced in bankruptcy litigation and can advise you on the proper course. This is not something you can do by yourself.
